lead_paragraph: Oscar Freire of Spain hopped across a curb yesterday to take the shortest line on a right turn and gain an advantage over three other riders in the breakaway pack, sending him to victory in the 144.8-mile seventh stage of the Tour de Suisse from St. Moritz to Ascona.
